summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2722, for the improvement of Avalon Way, from West Spokane Street to 36th Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same; and including as part of said improvement the construction and adjustment of a trestle approach to Avalon Way on West Spokane Street, under Ordinance No. 32002 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
